ka maginda yanna sahitha sawisthara warthawak kandawimata mehidi niyama keleya.sakkikaruwanta balapam athi bawin thangalla adhikaranayen mema naduwa kolambaa pradhana mahesthrath adhikaranaya wetha yomu kota thibu athara mema naduwe handuna ganime perattuwa pawa sakakaruwanta nopenena lesa sakkikaruwan randawimen pawathwa athi bawata adhikaranayen karunu anawaranaya wiya.siddhiya eeye (28) adhikaranaya hamuwe kanda wu awasthawe di rahas polisiya pawasa sitiye 2013/6/5 wana dina polispathiwarayage niyogayakata anuwa mema naduwa rahas polisiya wetha bara dun bawaya.aparadha sthanaye laba gath rudhira sampal ha sakakaruwange rudhira sampal ragama anuka waidya pitaya wetha yomu karana lada bawath ehi wishleshana warthawa methek nolabunu bawa pawasu rahas polisiya ema parikshana sandaha gewiya yuthu 585000/=ka mudala ada dina sakkikaruwan gewana bawa pawasiya.thawada ti 56 gini awiya ha anakuth nadu bhanda rajaye rasa parikshaka wetha yomu kara eki wartha nadu warthawata gonu kara athi bawa rahas polisiya di.en.ee. wishleshana warthawa ha nithipathi upades laba gatha yuthuwa athi bawa pawasiya.mandilla para, marakolliya, thangalla lipinaye sandahan ‘da nechar’ namathi hotalaye 2011/12/24 dina naththal uthsawaya nimiththen di je sangithaya sahitha rathri sadayak pawathwa thibe.sadaya pawathwemin thibiyadi anka 58-4413 darana wan rathayen thangalla pradeshiya sabhawe sabhapathi sampath athulu 10 denakugen yuthu kandayamak sadayata sahabhagi wi atha.madhyama rathriye rathinynya pupuruwana awasthawe di pradeshiya sabhapathi ti 56 gena ahasata wedi thabu bawath ehidi athiwu bahinbas wimaka di hotalaye kalamanakaru wana ayan akalanka samanga aarawulak athi wi thibe.mema aarawula samatha kirima sandaha hotalaye randi siti brithanya jathika kuran sheman seyin madihath wu bawath bothalayak kada ohuta amanushika lesa pahara di ghathanaya kala bawata paminille sandahan we.mema brithanya jathikayage pemwathiya wana rusiyanu jathika wiktoriya alam tochina namaththiyage angata nana thatakaya asala di pudgalayin thidenaku panna bawath in ayeku thamata pahara dun athara thama nawatha nana thatakaya wetha watunu bawata karunu wartha we.mema awasthawe di barapathala thuwala labu aya galla karapitiya rohale hadisi eekakayata athulath kala athara ‘nechar’ hotalayata alabhahani kala sakakaruwan ehi wikinima sandaha pradarshanaya kota thibu deshiya wideshiya mathpan bothal da kollaka wan rathayen palagos atha.aparadhaya wu sthanaya soko niladharin parikshawata lak kala athara his patharom kopu kihipayak da polisiya soyagena thibe.obadaaarachchige lahiru kalum, udawanage saman deshapi්raya, sampath chandra pushpa widanapathirana, wirappulige pranith chathuranga, mohottige sarath nohoth sahan, saranaaarachchi patabandige pranith chathuranga, hewakowilage nuwan chinthaka nohoth pati, edirisuriya patabandige nadira shamel yana sakakaruwan eeye (28) kolambaa mahesthrath adhikaranaya hamuwe peni sitiyaha.danata mahadhikarana apa matha sitina mowunta nithiwirodhi raswimaka samajikayinwa sitimin gini awi penwa marana bawata tharjanaya kota manushya ghathanayak kirima, barapathala thuwala sidu kirima ha depala kollaka anarthayak sidu kirima yana chodana polisiya gonu kota thibini.panadura, hirana padinchi rayigamage dilrukshi tharanga piris mema siddhiye paminiilikariya we.mehidi thewani sakakaruta
